list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ;
li.text: Be sure that you fully understand the work procedures and precautions before operating and maintaining the machine. Never operate any machinery if you are unsure about any points.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ;
li.text: Check that the clothes you are wearing are suitable for operation.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ;
li.text: Perform periodic
maintenance.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:1px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:1px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ;
li.text: Confirm that all safety devices are functioning properly before operating and maintaining the machine.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ;
li.text: Periodically back up the parameters when the machine was shipped and the program and offset data that have been prepared by the customer. Makino is not liable for any program or offset data that is corrupted or lost.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ;
li.text: Makino does not accept responsibility for any trouble caused by apparatus or programs prepared by the customers, such as damage to workpieces or the machine.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:1px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:1px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ;
li.text: For details on replacement parts, contact your Makino service representative. Use of improper parts may result in reduced machine performance or safety, damage to the machine, or operator injuries.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ;
li.text: Perform the lock-out and tag-out procedures.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ;
li.text: Make sure the operator knows the location of the "Emergency Stop" switches for each device so that they can be easily operated in the event of an abnormal or dangerous situation.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ;
li.text: Be sure to observe the information on the warning labels. Contact your Makino service representative if a warning label comes off or becomes illegible.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ;
li.text: When handling a hazardous or toxic material (oils, cutting fluids, and other chemical substances), obtain the safety data sheet (SDS), and follow the instructions. The safety data sheet (SDS) contains information about the safe handling of hazardous and toxic materials, and emergency measures

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ;
li.text: For models with graphite specifications, do not suck in anything other than dust (graphite) into the dust collector. Failure to observe this precaution may result in a dust explosion. It may also result in filter damage.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:10px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:10px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:47px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:47px left ;
li.text: For models with graphite specifications, to prevent health hazards due to dust (graphite), observe the following:

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:10px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:60px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:74px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:10px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:60px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:74px left ;
li.text: After machining a workpiece (product), wait until floating dust is collected into the dust collector to open the operator door.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:63px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: If you open the operator door immediately after machining, floating dust scatters outside the machining chamber.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:21px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:59px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:74px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:21px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:59px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:74px left ;
li.text: To perform any of the operations below, be sure to wear a high efficiency dust proof mask. (Recommended: 99.9% or higher particle collection efficiency)

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:62px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Sucking in dust may cause pneumoconiosis.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:73px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:100px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:73px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:100px left ;
li.text: When opening or closing the operator door

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:73px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:100px left ;
li.text: When working with the operator door being open

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:73px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:100px left ;
li.text: When replacing a tool in the tool magazine

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:73px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:100px left ;
li.text: When handling dust

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:60px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:74px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:11px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:60px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:74px left ;
li.text: While the dust collector is running, do not remove the dust car or the chip bucket. Otherwise, dust scatters around.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:60px; line-height:1.18; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-before:always; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:74px left ;
